newsitem.title: USA: H&R Block decides not to spin off Compuserve.
newsitem.headline: H&R Block decides not to spin off Compuserve.

text.p: H&R Block Inc. said Wednesday it has decided not to pursue the proposed spin-off of the rest of its Compuserve Corp. online service.

The Kansas City, Mo.-based company, which owns 80 percent of Compuserve after spinning off part of the online provider earlier this year, cited Compuserve's recent and projected losses and market uncertainties regarding the online industry.
